text: It felt... like we were idols, didn't it, Hiori?
What's up, Hiori? Weren't we like idols?

Well, we are idols, but...
it's just...

...Signing at a CD shop feels really idol-like,
doesn't it?

I see...?
Singing and dancing can be done by anyone, not just idols.

Well, even non-idols
can sign on panels.
Yeah, I get it! It's kind of like being a celebrity!

...After doing various things,
we're still idols, aren't we?
